scripts.postinstall: cd 3 && typings install && typings prune && cd ../4 && typings install && typings prune
scripts.build+test-v3: npm run build-v3 && npm run test-v3
scripts.build+test-v4: npm run build-v4 && npm run test-v4
scripts.build: npm run build-v3 && npm run build-v4
scripts.test: npm run test-v3 && npm run build-v4
scripts.build+test: npm run build+test-v3 && npm run build+test-v4
